prompt: Which of the following features would you be the MOST likely to find on a social networking site?
feedback: The most common feature of social networking sites is the ability to post short comments, either by themselves or attached to other people’s posts. Social sites are based on user content and posts, so they’re less likely to sell their own products. Although some sites might provide features to create videos or trade unwanted gifts, these features are much less common than the ability to post short comments. Sites such as Twitter and Facebook are based around posting short comments and links.
